name: 1000 Stars
description:
The year is 20XX. Your people are trapped by the walls of the purple nebula. YOUR MISSION: You are a space fighter pilot. Explore the galaxy, find the three crystals to unlock what lies beyond the purple nebula and save your people.

Explore three perilous planets! Harness the power of the QBOX!

Featuring a bizarre twist ending.

Soundtrack can be streamed on Bandcamp.
